Constructor for the PathPlanner Class.

This is a constructor of the PathPlanner Class:

Parameters:
rob a Pointer to a CasPlanner::Robot Class.
map_in a Pointer to a CasPlanner::Map Class.
dG a double variable representing an acceptable proximity to the game for ending the Search.
bridge_len a double variable representing the length of the Bridge for the Bridge Test.
bridge_r a double variable representing the sampling resolution of the bridge test.
reg_g is a double variable representing the regular grid resolution.
reg_conn_rad is a double variable representing the distance used to connect neigbouring nodes.
obst_pen is a double variable representing the distance from the obstacles to start penalizing.
bridge_conn_rad_in is a double variable representing the distance used to connect bridge nodes with adjacent nodes.

void CasPlanner::PathPlanner::generateSpace (  ) 

Generates the search Space.

This method generates the search Space. It checks first for a previously generates search Space file and if found then use it instead of generating the search space from scratch (upto 10 times faster). If the file is not found then it generates the search space using the enabled sampling methods (BridgeTest/Regular Grid). The generated Space will then be saved for later use.
